message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than what you're willing to pay. I propose a special introductory price of $110 for you, considering your interest and potential long-term relationship with our company. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the excellence of our product at an exclusive rate. Let me know if you're interested!
